articles.headline: Mahomes Throws 4 TDs in Chiefs Win
articles.content: Patrick Mahomes led the Chiefs with four touchdown passes, securing a dominant victory over their division rivals.

articles.headline: McCaffrey Racks Up 150 Yards Against Rams
articles.content: Christian McCaffrey showcased his versatility with 150 all-purpose yards as the 49ers defeated the Rams in a close matchup.
